author: , The Advocate
title: Ramadan: Why are the last 10 nights so important to Muslims? Find out more
text: Ramadan: What happens during Laylat al-Qadr and the last 10 nights? More about the holy month [Ramadan began](https://www.cincinnati.com/story/news/2024/03/07/when-is-ramadan-2024-everything-you-need-to-know-about-the-holy-month/72877705007/) on the night of March 10. Muslims worldwide celebrate the holy month of fasting with spiritual cleansing, self-reflection, acts of kindness and avoiding wrongdoings. Two-thirds of Ramadan have flown by, and the night of March 30 signifies the beginning of the [final 10 nights of Ramadan](https://www.islamchannel.tv/blog-posts/why-are-the-last-ten-days-of-ramadan-so-important). During one of these nights comes a special night — Laylat al-Qadr. Why are the final days of Ramadan so important? How will Muslims worship leading up to Eid al-Fitr? Here's what to know. Ramadan: [How long do Muslims in Ohio fast? When do Muslims break their fast?](https://www.cincinnati.com/story/news/2024/03/13/ramadan-when-muslims-break-fast/72955873007/) What is Laylat al-Qadr? [Laylat al-Qadr](https://www.middleeasteye.net/discover/islam-laylat-qadr-night-power-holiest-night-explained) means ‘the night of decree’ in Arabic. This night signifies when the Holy Quran was revealed to Prophet Muhammad. Laylat al-Qadr is one of the most sacred nights on the Islamic calendar. It only occurs during Ramadan, and will last one night from sunset to sunrise. This divine night falls sometime during the last 10 nights of Ramadan. When does Laylat al-Qadr happen during Ramadan? There is never a definite date for when Laylat al-Qadr occurs, but it is believed to fall during an odd-numbered night during the last 10 nights of Ramadan, with the odd-numbered nights being measured from the holy month's starting day. Laylat al-Qadr is sometimes predicted to be on the 27th night of Ramadan. According to scholars, some signs of Laylat al-Qadr are feelings of tranquility, a comfortable breeze in the air, and the sun will rise without rays the following morning. What is the significance of Laylat al-Qadr? The Quran was revealed to Prophet Muhammad through Angel Gabriel this night. The Quran is the direct word of God and contains moral code, spiritual guidance, and prophetic narratives. Qadr, in Arabic, literally translates to ‘destiny’ or ‘decree’. In the Quran, it says a night of worship during Laylat al-Qadr is equivalent to a thousand nights of worship — any acts of worship performed on this night carries greater reward than on any other day. It is believed that Muslims can change their fate and what was written for them by God through prayer and supplication. How do Muslims worship during the last 10 nights of Ramadan? Because no one knows which day Laylat al-Qadr falls on, Muslims are encouraged to take advantage of every night during the final one-third of Ramadan. The last 10 nights are said to be overflowing with God’s mercy and forgiveness. Ramadan: [Muslims will feast after breaking fast at suhoor festivals in Ohio this weekend](https://www.dispatch.com/story/news/2024/03/28/ohio-muslims-ramadan-suhoor-festivals-weekend/73121358007/) Everyday Ramadan rituals remain, such as fasting, reading the Quran, and taraweeh (special Ramadan night prayers). Muslims will spend a lot of time focusing on more worship and repentance, and will spend entire nights praying instead of sleeping. Muslims also perform i’tikaf during these last 10 nights, which is the act of spending days and nights in a mosque to perform devout worship. Muslims will use these nights to ask for forgiveness for previous sins, and pray for what they want in this world and the next. Generosity is heavily encouraged during the last 10 nights. This is called sadaqah, or voluntary charity, and can be in many forms, such as feeding someone a meal, donating to charity, performing a good deed, or doing an act of kindness.

author: Ricardo Vidal
title: Jennifer Lopez se sincera sobre su año más complicado: 'Me dolió muchísimo'
text:
El 2024 fue un año difícil para Jennifer Lopez, quien además de haber enfrentado su divorcio de Ben Affleck, se vio obligada a cancelar su gira mundial. Dos golpes que sin duda pusieron en jaque su estabilidad emocional y familiar, pero que le ayudaron para fortalecerse y regresar con toda la fuerza posible. Algo de lo que habló durante su más reciente show en Barcelona, España, en donde sincera y dirigiéndose completamente en español a su audiencia, admitió venir de un momento sumamente vulnerable.
Durante una pausa en su show, JLo se tomó un momento para acercarse a su audiencia y con el corazón en la manó expresó: “El verano pasado tuve que cancelar una gira que habíamos planeado en Estados Unidos y a nivel internacional. Me dolió mucho hacerlo”, dijo completamente en español y visiblemente conmovida. “Yo sé que no salgo de gira todo el tiempo, y mis fans esperan con ganas estos momentos… Yo sí (espero estos momentos), muchísimo”, agregó.
Fue entonces que la actriz se mostró vulnerable y reflexionó sobre lo vivido durante el último año y la forma en la que, por sus hijos, Emme y Max, logró salir adelante. “Fue un verano duro, para mí y mis hijos, pero les hice una promesas a mis hijos: quise demostrarles que se pueden atravesar momentos difíciles, que estas cosas a veces pasan en la vida, pero que de todo se sale siendo aún más fuertes y mejor que antes. Siempre se puede salir más fuertes”, finalizó.
Su verano más difícil
Las recientes declaraciones de Jennifer López hablan del momento profundamente humano en su vida, marcado por la introspección y el desafío de reconstruirse tras el fin de su matrimonio con Ben Affleck y la cancelación de su gira. “Cuando tu casa entera explota, estás ahí parada en los escombros diciendo: '¿Qué hago para que esto nunca vuelva a pasar?’”, compartió con franqueza hace unos meses en unca charla con Interview. Este proceso la ha llevado a reconocer que aún está aprendiendo y que es fundamental asumir la responsabilidad emocional: “Nunca dejes de mirar hacia adentro porque es tan fácil culpar al resto de la gente”.
Durante el verano pasado, el cual pasó en los Hamptons y Nueva York, lejos de Affleck, quien se encontraba en Los Ángeles, la artista enfrentó el reto de la soledad y el reencuentro consigo misma. “Fue muy difícil”, confesó, describiendo el proceso como “solitario, desconocido, aterrador, desesperado”. Aun así, encontró una lección poderosa en medio de esa experiencia: “Nada de eso te mata y aprendes a encontrar la felicidad por ti misma”. Sus palabras reflejan no solo el dolor de la ruptura, sino también una determinación profunda por crecer y sanar desde adentro.

author: Shopping guide
title: 防災協會掛保證，河水直接喝？這款淨水器還可以太陽能充電，日本亞馬遜限時 71 折，免運直送台灣 #Shopping guide (241938) - Cool3c
text:
近日中南部遭到雷雨狂炸，雷擊也導致多處停電，讓原本就處於災區的嘉南地區再度受創。基隆外海也因俄羅斯 8.7 強震引發海嘯警報，人心惶惶。當救援尚未到來之前，一般民眾該如何延長自身的生存能力？真的只有準備防災包才是唯一解方。
我們的建議是：防災包裡絕對不能少了「淨水器」。只要能取得 乾淨水源 ，存活機率就會大幅提升，建議 點我搭配文章閱讀 。
日本防災意識領先全球，因此這裡要介紹一款獲得 日本防災協會認證 的 Greeshow 淨水器（目前在日亞特價 71 折，日幣 14,979 元，約台幣 3,006 元且免運）。它支援 太陽能、手動、Type-C 充電三種充電方式，就算斷電也能持續運作，確保你有安全水源可以喝。
蓄電只需 2 小時，續航力就 可達 5 小時 ！有興趣的話，一起來看看它的產品亮點吧～
90 秒閃電淨化！河水瞬間變成敢「直接生喝」的甘露
Screenshot 圖片來源： 日亞
淨水器最重要的功能是什麼？就是要把水從不能喝，變成可以安心入口，「過濾」能力是關鍵。這款 Greeshow 淨水器堪稱是 行動小型淨水廠 。你只要按下機身上的綠色按鈕，約 1分半可以 過濾約 1公升 的水，有效去除水中的顆粒物、大腸桿菌、沉積物等雜質。
更酷的是，它的外置濾心可以做 「逆向清潔」 。只要將原本的 In & Out 插頭對調後，就能啟動逆向水流把內部濾心清洗乾淨，真正做到延長濾芯壽命，也能保持後續過濾效率。濾芯也可以在日亞獨立購買（台幣約 783元），更環保也更耐用！
貼心提醒：濾芯約半年更換一次即可～

Screenshot 圖片來源： 日亞
這款淨水器 內建活性碳 的關係，喝起來不會有讓人害怕的生水味。不管是河水、溪水、甚至是雨水的淨化，壞水也能變好水！有網友實際用放了兩年的塑膠瓶裡的水、稻田裡的水實測。過濾後的水 清澈無異味 ，口感很好外，胃也沒有任何不適感。
除了淨水功能外，它還能作為災難應變的好幫手。不僅支援三種充電方式（太陽能、手動、Type-C充電）外，多餘的電力還能 反向充 行動電源或手機；內建 LED 手電筒 功能，在斷電時也能提供基本的照明。一台 3000元，兼具淨水器＋行動電源＋手電筒，CP 值超高！
現在 Greeshow 淨水器在日亞祭出 71 折優惠 外還享免運費。雖然我們沒辦法預測災害何時來臨，但提前準備好這款多功能淨水器，就可以給彼此及家人多一份安心感！

author: Micah Zimmerman
title: Solv Protocol launches staking token to bring Bitcoin yields to Solana
text:
News Share
Link copied Solv Protocol has introduced ‘SolvBTC.JUP’, a new Liquid Staking Token that lets Bitcoin investors earn returns through Solana’s decentralized finance ecosystem.
Even though it is only in its pilot phase, SolvBTC.JUP offers Bitcoin holders a way to generate returns, paid in Bitcoin ( BTC ), by participating in Solana’s ( SOL ) Jupiter Exchange, according to a press release shared with crypto.news.
The process works by depositing Bitcoin into Solv Protocol. In exchange, users receive SolvBTC.JUP, which represents their staked Bitcoin.
This token accrues yield over time based on Solv’s involvement in the Jupiter Liquidity Provider Pool. The Jupiter Exchange , a platform for decentralized perpetual trading, allows liquidity providers to earn fees based on trading activity.
Solv’s strategy minimizes risks by hedging exposure to market movements while maintaining the Bitcoin stake.
You might also like: Montenegro to finalize Do Kwon’s extradition by Oct. 20 What this means For Bitcoin holders unfamiliar with DeFi , staking means temporarily locking up tokens to support a network or participate in a trading pool. In return, the staked tokens earn rewards, often in the form of the same token.
SolvBTC.JUP allows Bitcoin owners to participate in this system on the Solana network without giving up their Bitcoin exposure. With an expected return of 12%, per the press release, SolvBTC.JUP builds on Solv’s previous success in offering Bitcoin staking on other platforms.
You might also like: Sui’s Mysten Labs launches Walrus Protocol public testnet for decentralized storage

author: fernando.davila
title: Suman 690 muertes y poco más de 14 mil contagios de Covid-19 en el país
text:
Hasta el pasado 14 de diciembre, México acumuló 690 muertes y 14 mil 071 casos confirmados de covid-19.
TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Nueva investigación resuelve el posible origen del Covid-19 en mercado de China
La Secretaría de Salud informó que los contagios contabilizados representaron el 8.3 % del total de pacientes sospechosos que ascendieron a 169 mil 078.
Expuso que el 63.1 % de las personas que fueron reportadas con coronavirus no necesitaron hospitalización.
Detalló que por grupos de edad los casos graves de covid-19 y que requirieron internamiento se presentaron en adultos de 90 a 94 años de edad.
En la distribución por sexo, el 59.5 % de los contagios se confirmó en mujeres.
La dependencia federal reiteró que la vigilancia epidemiológica continuará exclusivamente bajo la estrategia centinela en Unidades de Salud Monitoras de Enfermedad Respiratoria Viral (USMER) y con la confirmación de casos mediante la prueba de RT-PCR.
Al comparar la información preliminar acumulada de 2024 con la de 2023 en la misma semana, se reporta un 30 % menos de casos”, señaló.
CDMX encabeza lista de contagios
Durante la semana epidemiológica número 50, que abarcó del 08 al 14 de diciembre, la Ciudad de México encabezó la lista de casos confirmados con 3 mil 318.
Le siguieron Querétaro con mil 208; Estado de México con mil 153 casos, Nuevo León con mil 135 y Puebla con 583. Con respecto a los fallecimientos, la capital del país también presentó el mayor reporte con 87 defunciones.
En orden descendente se ubicaron: Puebla con 56; Hidalgo con 48, Estado de México 45 y con 35 muertes, Veracruz.
Caos de influenza estacional
La Secretaría de Salud informó que durante la temporada de influenza estacional 2024-2025, que inició el pasado mes de octubre, se han confirmado mil 339 casos positivos a influenza y 11 defunciones en todo el país.
El 70.8 % de los contagios ocurrieron por influenza A (H3N2), el cual es el subtipo viral de mayor circulación. La población mayormente afectada por la infección fue la de 25 a 29 años de edad y los adultos mayores de 65 años.
CONSULTA AQUÍ LAS NOTICIAS DE ÚLTIMA HORA
fdm

author: @prokerala
title: Ricky Brabec wins the 2024 Dakar Rally with Adrien Van Beveren on the podium in third
text: Saudi Arabia, Jan 20 : 7,967 km of rallying across Saudi Arabia came to a conclusion by the breathtaking Red Sea at Yanbu with Honda Team's Ricky Brabec taking the top step of the Dakar for a second time, making history as the only American to do so. Saudi Arabia, Jan 20 (IANS) 7,967 km of rallying across Saudi Arabia came to a conclusion by the breathtaking Red Sea at Yanbu with Honda Teamâ€™s Ricky Brabec taking the top step of the Dakar for a second time, making history as the only American to do so. After spending much of the first week amongst the front runners, the 2020 winner took the reins after the gruelling 48-hr chrono and despite a one-second margin to second place Ross Branch at the end of stage seven, the Californian never looked back and rode to a faultless Dakar win with nearly eleven minutes in hand. In what has been a calm and collected display throughout the rally by the 32-year-old, he also added another stage win to the ten he has already collected in his Dakar career to date and leaves round one at the top of the 2024 World Rally-Raid Championship standings. At his ninth attempt of the Dakar, Frenchman Adrien Van Beveren stood on the podium that has eluded him over the past few years after taking a hard-fought 48-hr Chrono stage victory, the sand specialist found his rhythm in the second week and had an immense battle with Ross Branch and teammate JosÃ© Ignacio Cornejo for the podium. Despite a near miss with a camel yesterday, he fought right to the end for the runner-up spot but had to make do with the final podium place. One of two Chilean riders in the Honda Team, â€˜Nachoâ€™ Cornejo had one of his career-best performances at the famous rally, from off he led in the standings and racked up a hat-trick of magnificent stage victories, also fighting for an elusive podium. Unfortunately, a fuel pump issue put paid to his fight yesterday and his final sixth place did not reflect on what a truly outstanding performance he produced. His fellow Chilean, Pablo Quintanilla has been the runner-up twice at the Dakar and as the most experienced member of the team was eager to turn his twelfth participation into victory. Unfortunately for the Dakar legend, the 48-hr Chrono would put paid to his chances when he ran short of fuel on the first day of the tough stage. Despite the disappointment he battled on helping his teammates and also taking valuable points in the World Rally-Raid Championship. With the new generation Honda CRF450 now a rally-winner, the Honda team put on a powerful display on their first outing in 2024 as the stage wins racked up over the two weeks. Tosha Schareina opened proceedings with the prologue victory, Nacho Cornejo gained the accolade of the most stage wins this year with three, Adrien Van Beveren banked two and Pablo Quintanilla and Ricky Brabec took one apiece to make seven in all. With the team fully deserving of some rest and recuperation, they will reconvene in April for the Rally-Raid in Portugal from April 2-7.

author: world today news
title: Exploring iOS 18.4: Dive into the Newest iPhone Features and Enhancements
text:
Apple’s iOS 18.4 Beta Unveils priority Notifications, Enhanced Image playground, and Expanded Language Support The first public beta version of iOS 18.4, launched this week, introduces several new features and improvements to Apple devices. While a notable revision of Siri’s AI is absent from this update, users can anticipate enhancements in other areas, including priority notifications, a new sketch style in image Playground, and expanded language support for Apple Intelligence. The stabilized version 18.4 is expected to arrive in April, promising a refined user experience.
Priority Notifications Streamline User Experience iOS 18.4 introduces a new system for managing notifications, designed to help users focus on what matters most. The “priority notification” feature classifies notifications based on their importance, highlighting them in a dedicated priority box at the top of the screen. This aims to reduce the noise of less critical alerts, ensuring users see the most relevant data first.Whether this function will be activated by default upon updating remains to be seen.
Image Playground Gains a “Sketch” Style apple users looking to add a creative touch to their content will appreciate the new “sketch” style in Image Playground. This feature, accessible through apple Intelligence tools when the device is set to English, allows users to generate images that appear to have been hand-drawn. This adds a personalized and artistic element to digital creations.
With iOS 18.4, Image Playground becomes more widely accessible, integrating into various applications such as messages, notes, keynote, freeform, and pages. The feature also extends to third-party applications that utilize the Playground image API, offering developers a new avenue for creative expression within their apps.
Ambient Music Comes to the Control Center Building upon Apple’s existing background sound function, wich provides ambient nature sounds, iOS 18.4 introduces a dedicated ambient music section in the control center. This new feature offers four distinct options: sleep, relaxation, productivity, and well-being. Tapping on one of these options initiates the playback of a corresponding reading list from Apple Music, providing users with curated soundscapes to enhance their daily activities.
Apple Intelligence Embraces New Languages A significant update in iOS 18.4 is the expansion of language support for Apple Intelligence. Previously limited to English, the AI-powered features now accommodate French, German, Italian, Portuguese of Brazil, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese (simplified).This allows users to utilize Apple Intelligence tools in their preferred language, enhancing accessibility and usability.
Users who previously switched their iPhone’s language to English to access Apple Intelligence can now revert to French, or any of the newly supported languages, with iOS 18.4. This expansion marks a significant step towards making Apple’s AI technology more inclusive and accessible to a global audience.
Recipes Arrive in the News+ Request Subscribers to Apple News+ will find a new section called Apple News Food+, offering access to tens of thousands of recipes. The section also includes articles, restaurant criticism and other food-related content.
The recipes disembark in News+ Apple CarPlay Interface Update The carplay interface now features three rows.
There are now 3 rows in the Carplay interface Apple The iOS 18.4 beta offers a glimpse into Apple’s ongoing efforts to refine and enhance the user experience. With features like priority notifications, the sketch style in Image Playground, ambient music in the control center, and expanded language support for Apple intelligence, this update promises to bring a range of improvements to iPhone users when the stabilized version arrives in April.
iOS 18.4: A Deep Dive into Apple’s Latest Innovations – Priority Notifications, enhanced Image Playground, and More! “Apple’s iOS 18.4 isn’t just an incremental update; it’s a strategic shift towards a more personalized and intuitive user experience.” – That’s the bold claim from Dr. Elena Ramirez, a leading expert in mobile operating systems and human-computer interaction.
World-today-News: Dr. Ramirez, iOS 18.4 introduces priority notifications. How meaningful is this feature in today’s hyper-connected world?
The introduction of priority notifications in iOS 18.4 is incredibly significant. We live in a world saturated with notifications, a relentless stream of alerts vying for our attention. This constant barrage leads to notification fatigue, reduced productivity, and even increased stress levels. priority notifications directly address this problem by allowing users to filter and prioritize alerts based on importance. Think of it as a elegant form of details triage; the system intelligently separates crucial alerts from less urgent ones, placing essential notifications front and center while minimizing distractions. this enhancement makes the user experience significantly more streamlined, focused, and less overwhelming, positively impacting well-being and efficiency.
World-Today-News: Expanding on that theme of prioritizing information, the update also enhances the image Playground feature with a new sketch style. How does this improve the user experience and unlock creative potential?
the “sketch” style within Image playground is a fantastic example of how technology can empower creative expression. By providing a tool that mimics the feel of hand-drawn art in a digital habitat, Apple is blurring the line between the conventional and the digital, making artistic creation more accessible to a broader audience. This is a significant advancement, offering a unique aesthetic and allowing users to easily add a personal touch to their digital creations within the apps where it is integrated such as Messages, notes, Keynote, Freeform, and Pages. This functionality, also available to third-party developers via the playground image API, stimulates innovation and extends the reach of this creative technology.
World-Today-News: iOS 18.4 significantly expands language support for Apple Intelligence. What does this mean for global users, and how does it impact accessibility?
The expanded language support for Apple Intelligence is a major step forward in making AI technology truly global and inclusive. Previously limited to English, the update now supports eight languages in the iOS 18.4 beta , fostering inclusivity and increasing accessibility for a diverse global user base. this allows a wider range of users to take full advantage of Apple’s AI capabilities in their native tongues, removing a significant barrier to integration. Improved accessibility translates directly to increased empowerment for users anywhere in the world; enabling seamless interaction with advanced features, regardless of linguistic background. This approach enhances user experience greatly and makes it considerably more effective and meaningful for non-English speakers. Consider, as an example, the impact on productivity for professionals using these tools. This change demonstrates Apple’s commitment to creating accessible technology.
World-Today-News: The new ambient music features and the overhaul of apple News+ with its food-focused component also show a keen focus on user experience and lifestyle integration. How do these features expand Apple’s ecosystem and further enhance user engagement?
The ambient music in the control center is another illustration of Apple focusing on the user experience. By offering specifically curated soundscapes, designed to support different activities, Apple isn’t just adding a feature; it’s weaving sounds into the fabric of daily life. Similarly, the addition of Apple News Food+ significantly expands the value proposition of Apple News+. This isn’t just adding recipes; it’s creating a fully immersive food experience within a central hub. This holistic approach to integrating different service aspects into one’s daily activities speaks to its potential for increased engagement and overall ecosystem cohesion. This curated selection promotes seamless integration with existing Apple Music services, and greatly optimizes the user experience.
World-Today-News: What are your overall thoughts on iOS 18.4, and what key takeaways should users consider?
iOS 18.4 represents a considered and impactful update focused on the core principles of usability, functionality and user experience enhancement. It is more then just a collection of new features. it reveals Apple’s commitment to streamlining user interaction, fostering creativity, and broadening global access to its advanced technologies.
Key Takeaways:
Prioritization of Information: The new priority notifications system significantly improves information management. Enhanced Creativity: The sketch style in Image Playground unlocks artistic potential for a wider audience and greatly expands the user’s creative capabilities. Global Inclusivity: Expanded language support for Apple intelligence ensures greater accessibility for a global user base. seamless Integration: Ambient music and Apple News Food+ expand Apple’s ecosystem and enhance overall user engagement. iOS 18.4 demonstrates Apple’s continued dedication to refining the user experience, emphasizing personalized functionality, and integrating technology thoughtfully across devices and services. The emphasis on user experience is shown throughout the entire operating system.The various improvements in this update combine to improve the usability and capability of Apple devices for a widespread range of users.
What are your thoughts on the new features? Share your opinions in the comments below, or join the conversation on social media!
iOS 18.4: A Revolutionary Leap in User Experience? An Exclusive Interview “Apple’s iOS 18.4 isn’t just a software update; it’s a paradigm shift in how we interact with our mobile devices.” This bold statement from Dr. Elena Ramirez, a leading expert in human-computer interaction adn mobile operating systems, sets the stage for our exclusive interview about the latest innovations in Apple’s iOS 18.4.
World-Today-News: Dr. Ramirez, iOS 18.4 introduces priority notifications. How meaningful is this feature in today’s information-saturated world, and how does it impact user well-being?
Dr. Ramirez: The importance of priority notifications in iOS 18.4 cannot be overstated. We’re living in an era of incessant notifications, a constant barrage of alerts vying for our attention. This information overload leads to what’s known as notification fatigue: reduced productivity, increased stress levels, and a diminished sense of well-being. Priority notifications directly address this by enabling users to intelligently filter and prioritize alerts based on their perceived importance. This elegant system intelligently separates crucial notifications from less urgent ones. Essential notifications are prominently displayed, minimizing distractions and promoting a more focused, less overwhelming user experience. This thoughtful design considerably enhances both well-being and productivity. imagine a busy professional who can instantly identify client calls or emails among the noise of social media updates or less critical app notifications. That’s the transformative power of this feature.
World-Today-News: Let’s shift our focus to the enhanced Image Playground, particularly the new “sketch” style. How does this improve the user experience and unlock creative potential for the average user and developers alike?
Dr. Ramirez: The “sketch” style in Image Playground is a fantastic example of how technology can empower creative expression. By providing a tool that emulates hand-drawn art in a digital surroundings, Apple is bridging the gap between traditional and digital mediums, democratizing artistic creation .This is a ample advancement, offering a unique aesthetic and allowing users to effortlessly add a personal touch to digital projects within various applications. its integration into core applications like messages,Notes,Keynote,Freeform,and Pages,along with availability to third-party developers via the Playground image API,stimulates innovation and broadens the reach of this technology. Now,individuals can easily create personalized artwork suitable for greeting cards,presentations,or even social media posts,thereby encouraging creativity at a grassroots level.
World-Today-News: The expansion of language support for Apple Intelligence in iOS 18.4 is noteworthy. What does this mean for global users,and how does it impact accessibility and usability?
Dr. Ramirez: The expanded language support within Apple intelligence genuinely democratizes access to Apple’s AI capabilities. Previously limited to English, the iOS 18.4 beta now incorporates French, German, Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish, Japanese, Korean, and Simplified Chinese. This means a wider global user base can leverage the power of Apple’s AI suite in their native tongues. The improved accessibility translates directly into increased empowerment,enabling seamless interactions with sophisticated features regardless of linguistic background. The impact on productivity, particularly for professionals using these tools daily, is significant. It truly exemplifies Apple’s commitment to building inclusive and universally accessible technologies and highlights its focus on global markets.
World-Today-News: The new ambient music features and the Apple News+ food-centric revamp show a focus on lifestyle integration. How do these features expand Apple’s ecosystem and enhance user engagement?
Dr. Ramirez: Indeed, both the ambient music in the Control Center and the expansion of Apple News+ with Apple News Food+ reflect Apple’s strategic move toward seamlessly integrating technology into various aspects of daily life. The curated soundscapes for relaxation, sleep, productivity, or well-being aren’t merely added features; they are thoughtfully designed to enhance different activities.The detailed ambiance options are seamless in their integration with Apple Music and are easy to access.Similarly, Apple News Food+, with its vast recipe collection, articles, and restaurant reviews goes beyond simply providing recipes. It forms a comprehensive food-centric experience, significantly increasing the value proposition of Apple News+. This holistic approach encourages more frequent and deeper engagement within Apple’s broader ecosystem. This demonstrates how careful attention to user lifestyles can meaningfully shape the user’s experience with the operating system.
World-Today-News: what are your overall thoughts on iOS 18.4, and what are the key takeaways users should consider?
Dr. Ramirez: iOS 18.4 represents a significant advance in the user experience,moving beyond incremental improvements. It demonstrates Apple’s commitment to user-centric innovation, streamlining interactions, fostering creativity, and broadening access to its technologies.
Key Takeaways:
Streamlined Information Management: The priority notification system dramatically improves the handling of vast quantities of notifications.
Enhanced Creative Expression: The “sketch” style in Image Playground empowers users to create easily shareable and artistic digital assets.
Global Accessibility: Expanded language support for Apple Intelligence removes language barriers to its powerful functionality and services.
Holistic Ecosystem Integration: Ambient music and Apple News Food+ enhance engagement by seamlessly blending Apple services with aspects of daily life.
iOS 18.4 showcases Apple’s ongoing dedication to refining the user experience and underscores the importance of thoughtful technology integration into diverse lifestyles. The updates within this new operating system make it a versatile tool that can be easily utilized by a variety of users.
What are your thoughts on these new iOS 18.4 features? Share your opinions in the comments below, or join the discussion on social media!

author: The Hans India
title: Ayodhya, other spiritual cities attracting big retail brands
text: New Delhi: With rising spiritual tourism, retail brands are expanding their presence in cities like Ayodhya, Varanasi, Amritsar, Puri, Tirupati, and Ajmer, and also offering products to cater to the needs of pilgrims, according to CBRE. Real estate consultant CBRE on Thursday released a report 'Decoding Real Estate through the Spiritual Tourism Lens', highlighting that retail chains are capitalising on the surge in spiritual tourism across 14 key cities in India.The report identifies Amritsar, Ajmer, Varanasi, Katra, Somnath, Shirdi, Ayodhya, Puri, Tirupati, Mathura, Dwarka, Bodh Gaya, Guruvayur, and Madurai as key cities witnessing this retail boom. The consultant noted that retail brands are strategically adapting their offerings in both established mall clusters and high-street locations to cater to the growing tourist population. In Ayodhya, Manyavar, Reliance Trends, Raymonds, Market99, Pantaloons, Domino's, Pizza Hut, and Reliance Smart have opened their retail stores, the report said. Manyavar, Reliance Trends, Zudio, Pantaloons, Shoppers Stop, Burger King, Domino's, Pizza Hut, McDonald's, Spencer's, Reliance smart, Croma and Reliance Digital are present in Varanasi. Anshuman Magazine Chairman & CEO, India, South-East Asia, Middle East & Africa, CBRE, said, "The rapid expansion of spiritual tourism in India is driving the growth of the country's faith-based tourism market."
